mapper.insert: insert into review (writer, content, visit_date, score, img, res_idx) values (#{writer}, #{content}, #{visit_date}, #{score}, #{img}, #{res_idx})
mapper.select: select r.*, b.name as res_name, b.address as res_address from review r inner join restaurant b on r.res_idx = b.idx order by r.idx desc offset #{offset} rows fetch first #{perCount} rows only
select * from review where res_idx = #{idx} order by idx desc
select res_idx from review order by idx desc fetch first rows only
select * from review order by idx fetch first 10 rows only
